meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #572.

td.p: Mitch Epner, a senior at Half Hollow Hills West High School from Dix Hills, New York
Amy Wilson, a junior at McGuinness High School from Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
Michael Galvin, a senior at Shaker Heights High School from Shaker Heights, Ohio

tr.td: LAKES & RIVERS
LEGENDS
TV ALIENS
OUTDOOR SPORTS
MULTIPLE CHOICE
FAMOUS PATS
